Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2007 11:33AM VLJ wrote: My onc does not do a breast exam, I do remove my shirt for exam of my neck and underarm. It sounds like every ONC is different and sounds like I need to look for a new one. He does exam, looks at blood work and that is all. What is the standard exam for ONC? GYN? Breast Surgeon?
Posts.Title: Physical exam with clothes on? (Say what!) Chelee StefS
